"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5330ef886368723d9a130000#post_5330ef886368723d9a130000

I always thought that a true rapper should be direct in their messages, not go with ties in his/her tongue. If someone will haul me rhymes, will receive rhymes, and if I receive blows, will receive blows. In the world of hip-hop and its 4 elements, the most important thing is the competition. Everyone wants to be the biggest, and the largest predator always finish with the smallest, and while nobody runs me, I will remain the biggest.

Peace
